item.description:
Join us for a fun day out this Saturday with food & the Arts! We will start off the day with a delightful brunch at Lucky's Lounge. Once we satisfy our stomachs, we'll head over to the Fort Point Channel Open Art Studios near South Station for an art-inspired afternoon.

For Lucky's menu:
http://www.luckysloun...

For a map of the open studios and parking info:
http://www.fortpointa...

Free parking is available for the Open studios in the Central Parking Lot across from 249 A street. Please enter the lot from Binford Street, off of A Street.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Brunch & Art Walk
